title: Tea Party Teddy
description: Tea Party Teddy is a political tell-all novel about Sacramento, California politics - the public corruption, infidelity, and greed.Teddy, a newly elected Assemblyman, is elected because of his hateful anti-immigration platform. When he gets to Sacramento, he struggles with the temptations that ultimate power affords. His world slowly unravels as he succumbs to the power of his office. The ultimate irony occurs when his wife becomes romantically involved with the founder of the Republicans for Latinos.
author: Dianne Harman
